messages.subject: Discouraged--long
messages.msgSnippet: That stamping set sounds like a lot of fun! I m sure for a 3 and 5 year old, they just wanted to dig in and didn t really think about taking care of it.
messages.messageBody:
"
That stamping set sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure for a 3 and 5
year old, they just wanted to dig in and didn't really think about
taking care of it."

Maybe someone has already posted this, I haven't read all the answers
yet, but I didn't realize they were 3 and 5!
I think I would not have put all the stamp pads out at once. I would
put all the stamps out and lotsa paper, but probably just give them
each one pad at a time unless they asked for more.

They're too little to keep colors separate, but I might like to keep
some pads nice for myself.

Let them mix playdough...it's cheaper and you won't feel badly if it
all ends up brown.;) Maybe have some stamp pads just for them and keep
some separate for everyone else?

Ren
